R

randFirstState() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
Called once every game in the first round, since this is the only time the next nation is not already set.
Randomizes a nation from the list, and get it's facts list from the DB.
randNation() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
Called at the start of every round.
In the first round, it randomizes once for the current round, and again on a different thread for the next round
In every other round, it sets the nation that was randomized in the previous round as the current nation, and randomizes
again for the next round.
randNextState() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
This function is identical to "randFirstState", except for the fact it saves the nation the was randomized in the
"game next fact" parameter.
This function is preformed by a different thread, to not disturb the flow of the game.
randomBin - Variable in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
 
randomizeBin() - Method in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
Uses the pointer to the number of the current bin, in order to randomize a number between current - 1 and current + 1.
This is done to make the game less deterministic.
randomizeFact() - Method in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
Randomizing fact in two levels - randomize bin from the buckets, randomize fact inside the bin
In case we are in the last bin and it's empty, we move the current bin pointer to points to the easy facts index.
The easy facts index is the nubmer of bin, from which all the facts inside it and inside the easier bins are consider
easy facts.
randomizeNextFact() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
prepare next fact already while this fact is still displayed
randomizeState() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
Function for randomizing state from the states list.
The function randomizing a number between 1 to the sum of all state's probabilities, and returns the nation with the closest
value to the randomized number, from all values that are larger then it.
The function randomizing states, until it gets a state that was not played in this game already.
readFile(String, String, int) - Static method in class NationMania.parsing.YagoParser
 
readFile(String, String, int, int) - Static method in class NationMania.parsing.YagoParser
reads yago files and collects entries that match searchTerm AND searchField
ReadFromFile(String) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Config
private service for loadConfig() function.
reducePoints(int) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called after player requests a new fact or continent, and reduces the number of points left for this round.
If the player requests a fact - the penalty is 2 points more than the last fact.
If the player requests a continent - the penalty is set to quater of the remaining round points.
reducePoints() - Method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
reduces points from potencial round points, as payment for clues and stuff.
relation - Variable in class NationMania.core.Fact
 
relation - Variable in class NationMania.parsing.YagoEntry
 
REPORT - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameFonts
 
reportBadClue - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
another boolean corresponding to the same toggle buttons
reportButtonPressed(boolean) - Static method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
updates to report mode when one of the toggle buttons is pressed
reportDeadGiveaway - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
a boolean corresponding to the toggle buttons
reportedFact - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
a text area where the user can speciffy the index of the fact they want to report
reportFact(int) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called after player makes a valid report - update fact on DB that has been reported.
If fact was reported more than a certain threshold, it will not be displayed anymore.
This action not valid for continent facts.
reportFact - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
label for "Report Fact" area title
reportFact() - Method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
where the actual fact reporting ("the magic") happens.
reset() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called every new round.
Resets the round parameters to their initial values
resetAfterUpdate() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.Settings
Called on update finish.
resetReportFact() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
unselecting the toggle and other stuff after the report.
resetValues() - Static method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
resets the values
rightEntity - Variable in class NationMania.parsing.YagoEntry
 
Round - Class in NationMania.core
Class containing all data for current round (one round = one state)
The data is only valid for the current game with the current player
Round() - Constructor for class NationMania.core.Round
 
roundOver() - Method in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
resets the values for the new round
roundScore - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameScreen
label showing how many points the player can earn if he guesses correctly.
row - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.HighScore
an array holding the labels for the high scores
runScript(Reader) - Method in class NationMania.db.YagoSQLScript
Runs an SQL script (read in using the Reader parameter)
runScript(Connection, Reader) - Method in class NationMania.db.YagoSQLScript
Runs an SQL script (read in using the Reader parameter) using the connection passed in
